thing-type.label: DSI-101 binary switch DSI-101 binary switch
thing-type.description: DSI-101 binary switch<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gthttps://defaro.ru/index.php/support/instructions/208-dsi-101</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gt1. Set controller in inclusion mode</p&gt <p&gt2. Press button on the device for three seconds</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gt1. Set controller in exclusion mode</p&gt <p&gt2. Press button on the device for three seconds</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtWakeup Information</h2&gt<p&gtPress button on the device once.</p&gt

parameter.name: config_1_1
parameter.label: 1: B1 operation mode
parameter.description: B1 operation mode<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt0 - Turn off for short press/Dim down for hold (monostable switch)</p&gt <p&gt1 - Turn on for short press/Dim up for hold (monostable switch)</p&gt <p&gt2 - Bistable switch</p&gt <p&gt3 - Scene activation mode</p&gt <p&gt4 - Monostable switch. Each press/hold switches on/off/sends dim up/down state for devices from AG 3 or 11 (only first device from this AG is supported!)</p&gt <p&gt5 - Bistable switch for devices from AG 3 or 11 (only first device from this AG is supported!)</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_2_1
parameter.label: 2: B2 operation mode
parameter.description: B2 operation mode<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt0 - Turn off for short press/Dim down for hold (monostable switch)</p&gt <p&gt1 - Turn on for short press/Dim up for hold (monostable switch)</p&gt <p&gt2 - Bistable switch</p&gt <p&gt3 - Scene activation mode</p&gt <p&gt4 - Monostable switch. Each press/hold switches on/off/sends dim up/down state for devices from AG 4 or 12 (only first device from this AG is supported!)</p&gt <p&gt5 - Bistable switch for devices from AG 4 or 12 (only first device from this AG is supported)</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_20_2
parameter.label: 20: Sensor 1 turn on value
parameter.description: Sensor 1 turn on value for AG 19

parameter.name: config_21_2
parameter.label: 21: Sensor 1 command off value
parameter.description: Sensor 1 command off value for AG19

parameter.name: config_22_1
parameter.label: 22: Sensor 1 conversion rules
parameter.description: Sensor 1 conversion rules<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtAll commands are sent to devices in AG 19</p&gt <p&gt0 - ignore sensor value</p&gt <p&gt1 - send ON if Value &lt;= Param20 and send OFF if Value &gt;= Param21</p&gt <p&gt2 - send OFF if Value &lt;= Param21 and send ON if Value &gt;= Param20</p&gt <p&gt3 - send ON if Value &lt;= Param20</p&gt <p&gt4 - send ON if Value &gt;= Param20</p&gt <p&gt5 - send OFF if Value &gt;= Param21</p&gt <p&gt6 - send OFF if Value &lt;= Param21</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_23_2
parameter.label: 23: Sensor 2 command on value
parameter.description: Sensor 2 command on value for AG 20

parameter.name: config_24_2
parameter.label: 24: Sensor 2 command off value
parameter.description: Sensor 2 command off value for AG 20

parameter.name: config_25_1
parameter.label: 25: Sensor 2 conversion rules
parameter.description: Sensor 2 conversion rules<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtAll commands are sent to devices in AG 20</p&gt <p&gt0 - ignore sensor value</p&gt <p&gt1 - send ON if Value &lt;= Param23 and send OFF if Value &gt;= Param24</p&gt <p&gt2 - send OFF if Value &lt;= Param24 and send ON if Value &gt;= Param23</p&gt <p&gt3 - send ON if Value &lt;= Param23</p&gt <p&gt4 - send ON if Value &gt;= Param23</p&gt <p&gt5 - send OFF if Value &gt;= Param24</p&gt <p&gt6 - send OFF if Value &lt;= Param24</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: group_2
parameter.label: 2: Scene activation set
parameter.description: <br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtScene Ids:</p&gt <table&gt<tr&gt<td&gtButton</td&gt <td&gtB1</td&gt <td&gtB2</td&gt <td&gtB3</td&gt <td&gtB4</td&gt <td&gtB5</td&gt <td&gtB6</td&gt <td&gtB7</td&gt <td&gtB8</td&gt </tr&gt<tr&gt<td&gtSceneID</td&gt <td&gt10</td&gt <td&gt20</td&gt <td&gt30</td&gt <td&gt40</td&gt <td&gt50</td&gt <td&gt60</td&gt <td&gt70</td&gt <td&gt80</td&gt </tr&gt</table&gt
